relevant_findings.general: Patient comfortable, lying in bed in no distress, no dyspnea

relevant_findings.abdominal: Moderately distended, slightly hypoactive but present bowel sounds, diffuse upper quadrant tenderness without rebound

relevant_findings.skin_lower_extremities: Trace pitting edema bilateral legs, warm and well-perfused
